item.title: 2.22.0 Preview Release
item.description: 2.20.0 Preview Release Percona Monitoring and Management 2.22.0 is released today as a Preview Release. PMM team really appreciates your feedback! We encourage you to try this PMM Preview Release in testing environments only, as these packages and images are not fully production-ready. The final version is expected to be released through the standard channels in the coming week. Known issue: PMM-8829 - “Missing Listen Port” error for external exporters after restart Release notes: Release Notes Preview found here
